page.title: 15 UNEMPLOYMENT
page.content: The{unemployment figures}in this area have{increased sharply}since {1972. The figures shown below are for the {Blaenavon to Cwmbran}area as there are no figures for our D-Block area alone. {In 1972, 5.7%}of the population (men and women who were looking for employ- ment) were unemployed. {In 1981,}this figure had risen to {13.9% {Now in 1985,}the unemployment figure for the above mentioned area is{14,% and this is likely to rise in the future. Mine closures and fewer job oppotunities in the area would seem to indicate hardship in the future for this area.
